author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Torex Gold Resources ‍Negotiations Between Community Leaders Have Resulted In An End To Blockades Of Co's ELG Mine Complex​
text:
April 6 (Reuters) - Torex Gold Resources Inc:
* ‍NEGOTIATIONS BETWEEN COMMUNITY LEADERS HAVE RESULTED IN AN END TO BLOCKADES OF CO’S ELG MINE COMPLEX​
* ‍PROCESSING OPERATIONS HAVE CONTINUED UNINTERRUPTED SINCE RESTART IN MID JANUARY​
* ‍MINING IN EL LIMON PIT IS EXPECTED TO RESUME ON APRIL 6, 2018 ​
* ‍MINING IN EL LIMON PIT IS EXPECTED TO RESUME TODAY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
